option_138.title: Header Background Color
option_138.css: .ui-bar-a, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-bar-inherit, html .ui-bar-a .ui-bar-inherit, html .ui-body-a .ui-bar-inherit, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-bar-inherit, html head + body .home-menu ul li > a.ui-btn:focus, .home-banner .swiper-active-switch, .theme-search .listing-style-button a.active { background-color: --COLOR--; border-color: --COLOR--; }|.list-menu ul li > a.ui-btn:hover{ background-color: --COLOR--; }
option_138.description: Configure background color for header of the app

option_137.title: Header Font and Icon Color
option_137.description: Configure font and icon color for header of the app

option_139.title: Highlighted Text Color
option_139.description: Configure font color for highlighted text messages such warnings, product price etc.

option_141.title: Primary Text Color
option_141.css: .ui-page-theme-a .ui-radio-on:after, html .ui-bar-a .ui-radio-on:after, html .ui-body-a .ui-radio-on:after, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-radio-on:after, .ui-btn.ui-radio-on.ui-btn-a:after {border-color: --COLOR-- ;}|.ui-page-theme-a .ui-checkbox-on:after, html .ui-bar-a .ui-checkbox-on:after, html .ui-body-a .ui-checkbox-on:after, html body .ui-group-theme-a .ui-checkbox-on:after, .ui-btn.ui-checkbox-on.ui-btn-a:after { background-color:--COLOR-- ;}|.ui-overlay-a, .ui-page-theme-a, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-panel-wrapper, .color-primary, [class^='list-'] h4, .ui-select .ui-btn.ui-btn-a, .ui-select .ui-btn.ui-btn-a:hover, .ui-select .ui-btn.ui-btn-a:active, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-checkbox .ui-btn, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-checkbox .ui-btn:hover, .ui-page-theme-a .ui-body-inherit { color: --COLOR--; }
option_141.description: Configure font color for primary text labels such as product name, category name etc.

option_140.title: Secondary Text Color
option_140.description: Configure font color for secondary text labels such as options names, no. of ratings etc.
